trans-unit.source: You need to shut down everything else before installing major programs

seg-source.mrk: You need to shut down everything else before installing major programs

target.mrk: You need to shut down everything else before installing major programs

trans-unit.source: If you are on a Windows system, click the X in the corner of each program.

seg-source.mrk: If you are on a Windows system, click the X in the corner of each program.

target.mrk: If you are on a Windows system, click the X in the corner of each program.

trans-unit.source: If you are on a Linux system, type kill -9 [PID] for each of your programs.

seg-source.mrk: If you are on a Linux system, type kill -9 [PID] for each of your programs.

target.mrk: If you are on a Linux system, type kill -9 [PID] for each of your programs.

trans-unit.source: You might want to save your data first.

seg-source.mrk: You might want to save your data first.

target.mrk: You might want to save your data first.

trans-unit.source: If you are on a Macintosh, you will have to ask someone else. I have a wonderful little iPod, but that is the limit of my experience with Apple products.

seg-source.mrk: If you are on a Macintosh, you will have to ask someone else.
I have a wonderful little iPod, but that is the limit of my experience with Apple products.

target.mrk: If you are on a Macintosh, you will have to ask someone else.
I have a wonderful little iPod, but that is the limit of my experience with Apple products.
